mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND delStatus = 0 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
SELECT * FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND delStatus = 0 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limitFrom}, #{itemsInAPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 1, title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET delDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
